name: Project Dreamcat
description:
NOTE: SAVING, PASSIVES AND COMBOS DO NOT WORK YET! IM SORRY!

A diablo-like rogue-like where you make builds on the fly with whatever loot drops, and explore procedural generated dungeons.

You play as Lax, a lazy cat able to enter Nightmares and turn them into peaceful dreams.

CONTROLS:

KEYBOARD

  • SPACE = Dash
  • Z = Use Left Weapon/Confirm
  • X = Use Right Weapon
  • C = Use Back Equip Spell
  • A = Use Health Potion
  • S = Use Magic Potion
  • Q = Equip
  • W = Equip Right Hand
  • Enter = Pause 
  • Backspace = FREEZE (for screenshot taking)

GAMEPAD (Xbox 360)

  • A = Dash/Confirm
  • X = Use Left Weapon
  • B = Use Right Weapon
  • Y = Use Back Equip Spell
  • Left Bumper = Use Health Potion
  • Right Bumper = Use Magic Potion
  • Lelft Trigger = Equip
  • Right Trigger = Equip Right Hand
  • Start = Pause 

CHEATS

Numkey 1 = Gain Level
Numkey 2 = Spawn loot at your feet


Follow Development:

  

Be a part of the community!
